Package utils

Class Models.Book

java.lang.Object
utils.Models.Book
Enclosing class:
Models
public static class Models.Book extends Object
This class represents a Book in the application.

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String genre, String publisher, String language, int publicationDate, int pages, String description, int copies, int borrows, String ISBN)
      Constructs a Book object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book
      author - the author of the book
      genre - the genre of the book
      publisher - the publisher of the book
      language - the language of the book
      publicationDate - the publication date of the book
      pages - the number of pages in the book
      description - the description of the book
      copies - the number of copies available for the book
      borrows - the number of times the book has been borrowed
      ISBN - the ISBN (International Standard Book Number) of the book
